displayName.text: New York Foundation for Senior Citizens

formattedAddress: 11 Park Pl # 1416, New York, NY 10007, USA
adrFormatAddress: 11 Park Pl # 1416, New York, NY 10007-2817, USA

originalText.text: New York Foundation for Senior Citizens Home Attendant Services, Inc. has been helping to take care of my dad for over a year.    He has been in constant danger of falling and has needed kind and careful help.    This has been consistently provided by New York Foundation for Senior Citizens Home Attendant Services, Inc.  This has been such a relief for my mom as well since she gets the extra help that is needed to support my dad. Not once did the agency fail to cover his hours, even when a home attendant had to cancel at the last minute.   It has also always been easy to communicate with the office, coordinators, and Supervisors.   The nursing help and advice was very useful as well.

text.text: New York Foundation for Senior Citizens Home Attendant Services, Inc. has been helping to take care of my dad for over a year.    He has been in constant danger of falling and has needed kind and careful help.    This has been consistently provided by New York Foundation for Senior Citizens Home Attendant Services, Inc.  This has been such a relief for my mom as well since she gets the extra help that is needed to support my dad. Not once did the agency fail to cover his hours, even when a home attendant had to cancel at the last minute.   It has also always been easy to communicate with the office, coordinators, and Supervisors.   The nursing help and advice was very useful as well.

originalText.text:
I am a current client And I can tell you there's a lot of shady things going on. My current coordinator jennifer Hernandez Basically Assigned my regular home attendant To another patient without telling me. As a result I was without Service for 3 hours. My advice is do not do business with this agency. If you leave a negative review they will pressure you to try to get it Erased The staff will lie in order to cover for Each other Use this company at your own risk. The only reason this company has any positive review Is because the coordinators have some friends post on their behalf Jennifer hernandez in particular is notorious for that. I even heard of situations where some coordinators would promise. Job opportunities for a good review
I will definitely look into other options for agencies

originalText.text: I wanted my mom to be with her family while she was aging. Her physical and mental health was declining and I needed trained home attendants to assist during the day and weekends. The Home Attendant Program helped complete us as a family when we needed help, and gave my mom the care and love she deserved.   I would highly suggest this program to anyone looking for assistance with their loved ones.

originalText.text:
I just wanted to take the opportunity to thank the Home Attendant Program and all the Home Attendants for the care and help you have given my aunt over the years. It is so comforting to me to know that she is in good hands and deeply cared for.

The Home Attendants you send her are excellent and I never worry. Each and every Home Attendant has taken great care of my aunt.  Again, let me thank you for all you have done and continue to do for my aunt.

originalText.text: People in Agencies always cover for the other. The problem in this agency is that Dominican Coordinators cover only for their own Dominicans Home Health Aide. If you are any other Nationality you are screwed (not covered) In Emergency coverage (calll out). This agency needs to fix that race problem.
